document_name: Signed Pro Doc_Human Security and Leadership Academy.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/THA/Signed Pro Doc_Human Security and Leadership Academy.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
-Thailand National Human Security Strategy available
-Culturally and gender sensitive implementing guideline and working definitions of key project concepts available
-Increased leadership skills/ capacity of Muslim women participating in project activities
-Muslim women network strengthened and recognized as main mechanism to promote active participation of southern Muslim women in development and politics
-Documentation and dissemination of good practices from Leadership Academy Programme

project_descr: Promoting Social Inclusiveness through National Human Security Strategy and the Leadership Academy Programme for Muslim Women in the Southern Provinces of Thailand (2012-2015)
project_title: Promoting Human Security and Leadership AcademyProgramme
